snippet: The emergence of Tea Party opposition to a strike in Syria poses a challenge to leaders in the Republican Party, many of whom favor military action.
abstract: Emergence of Tea Party opposition to a strike in Syria poses challenge to leaders in the Republican Party, many of whom favor military action; issue brings Tea Party movement into ideological alignment with progressive antiwar groups like MoveOn.org.
lead_paragraph: The emergence of Tea Party opposition to a strike in Syria poses a challenge to leaders in the Republican Party, many of whom favor military action.

headline.main: Tea Party Extends Focus to Include Rallying Against a Syria Strike
headline.print_headline: Tea Party Extends Focus to Include Syria Strike, Along With Economic Issues
